name: Game of Mouse
description:
Game of Mouse-  The Group

Oh no! The mouse is lost in the forest and angered the ravens that live in it. Help the mouse to reach safety by jumping over the obstacles.

Game of Mouse is an easy game where the player only has to press space to jump in order to get past the obstacles. You can win the game by getting to the end of the level and out of the forest.

Happy gaming!
